name: Read EA Exams for ALL teams and write the exam results to "NetZero Academy.EA Exams"

mapper.command:
select
	distinct on
	(u.user_id,
	e.exam_id,
	ue.finished_at) CONCAT(u.email,
	'-',
	e.exam_id,
	'-',
	TO_CHAR(ue.finished_at,
	'DD.MM.YYYY - HH:mm')) as "ID",
	u.first_name as "First name",
	u.last_name as "Last name",
	u.email as "E-Mail",
	u.team as "EA Team",
	t.label as "Label",
	e.name as "Exam",
	e.exam_id as "ExamID",
	ue.has_passed as "Has passed",
	TO_CHAR(ue.finished_at,
	'DD.MM.YYYY - HH:mm') as "Finished at"
	from users u
join users_exams ue on
	ue.user_id = u.user_id
join exams e on
	ue.exam_id = e.exam_id
join teams t on
	u.team::text like '%' || t.team::text || '%'
	where ue.finished_at is not null
	and ue.finished_at >= NOW() - interval '24 hours'
order by
	u.user_id,
	e.exam_id,
	ue.finished_at desc;

parameters.label: Continue the execution of the route even if the module returns no rows
